title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Haleakalā, Hawaii
content:
Photo submitted by Gideon Garcia, “Earlier this month I made a successful ascent of Haleakalā on Maui. Awesome ride, not too much traffic, and thankfully not too rainy on the mountain that day. Took about 5.5 hours of biking time to go from sea to summit, just over 10,000 feet of climbing. My trusty 2014 steel […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Haleakalā, Hawaii appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
